features: ✅ Proper Size: The clear cross body purse bag is 8.3 x 6.3 x 2 inches, enough to put a cell phone, wallet, cosmetics, Inner Pocket is ideal for placing cash, credit cards, tickets and other small items.

✅ Free Your Hands: The strap length of this black clear messenger bag can be adjusted from 30 inches to 55 inches, allows you to adjust to the best angle for crossbody. Raise your hand to cheer for your favorite team, band.

✅ Waterproof & Premium Material: The small clear plastic crossbody bag is water-resistant, which is made of 0.5mm thick waterproof pvc to keep the items of the bag from getting wet from rain and sweat. But please do not soak in water.

✅ Stadium Approved: TEABAN gold clear purse meets stadium game day bag requirement of no bigger than 12×12×6 inches. Buy yourself a mini clear stadium handbags purse, you can get through a security line easily and faster.
✅ Multiple Application Scenario: The simple and generous clear football bag very versatile, suitable for women and men; perfect for travel, picnic, sports events, concerts, or any outdoor activity.

✅ More Style : The clear vinyl bag stadium approved has two shoulder straps of different styles, which can be matched with different shoulder straps accoarding to different clothes. Which means you have bought two see through bag!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Novel built-in transparent half-pocket design Front of the clear purse The aesthetics of what is inside the bag that can be perfectly displayed to others. Reverse side of the clear purse Place items that will reveal information about you that will not be easily seen.
More Colors More Styles Clear bag with more colors and styles, allowing you to enjoy more diverse sports events Whether it's value for money, durability, or waterproof, it's an great choice!

Different straps for different styles The black shoulder straps show your quiet side. The leopard print straps show your wild side. This clear wristlet bag stadium approved is designed with interchangeable straps, allowing you to choose the straps you need according to different moods and outfits.
Better buckles and zippers The zipper and bag buckle are made of alloy material, more robust and durable, giving you a better experience.

Purchase Notes The production line strictly controls quality, and this clear hand is handed over to you after a triple inspection. If stadium bag is squeezed and deformed, you can use hot air to help restore it to its original shape. If you purchase a clear crossbody bag that is unfortunately damaged in transit, please let us know We respond to you within 24 hoursand give a solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a clear bag for going to a sporting event for my son. I liked the leopard print strap. It also came with a black strap. The leopard strap is thick, heavy duty material and very durable. Way better than I expected. The black strap is thinner and not as nice. The bag fit my oversized wallet, sunblock and a few other items. It was perfect for what I needed and super cute. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sporting events
reviews.reviewText: This bag was perfect for the football game we went to. It's a great size, good quality and love the extra strap it comes with. Two thumbs up 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for concerts!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two bags for myself and my daughter. They were the perfect size for our concert. Very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for games
reviews.reviewText: I love the size of the bag and the animal print strap. The black strap wasn't quite as nice quality, so I will just use the print one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and appropriate
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with how well the bag is made. Feels like it will hold up well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked out great
reviews.reviewText: Good size. Perfect for sporting event we were going to. Crossbody option worked well to feel my stuff was safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for stadiums with a clear bag policy!
reviews.reviewText: I had a clear bag that was my go-to stadium bag that served its purpose, but unfortunately, my house burned down 5.5 months ago, so I'm starting over from scratch. That lead me to this bag...which I actually like more than my old one. Love the fact that it comes with two straps - I chose to use the leopard print strap.Strap is adjustable (which is good, because I'm a big girl and I wanted to wear it as a cross-body) and adds a little stylish flair when you're forced to conform to misogynistic stadium clear bag policies (that do nothing but show potential thieves what women are carrying which puts women at risk) in order to attend concerts and sporting events. Bag was plenty big enough for all I needed to carry. Seems well-made for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This purse works great for the new rules at concerts, festivals & any venues where you can't take a purse. Holds a good amount of items & is very sturdy
Attended an NFL game and a clear bag was required (when entering the stadium). This purse bag was perfect for the event. Spacious enough to carry the essentials + a fold-able poncho.
